sections.title: DNS Records
sections.content:
# Learn

### DNS Records

* A Record → Domain → IP
* CNAME → Alias
* TTL → Cache duration

DNS is **cached heavily**, causing delayed updates.

sections.title: Practice: Local DNS Simulation
sections.content:
# Practice — Local DNS Simulation

Edit hosts file:

**Windows**

```
C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\hosts
```

Add:

```
127.0.0.1 mysite.local
```

Test:

```
http://mysite.local
```
